product_name: Backcountry Access Float Compressed Air Cylinder
long_description: This Backcountry Float compressed air cylinder works with Float Avalanche Airbag packs to rapidly inflate the airbag and help keep you at or near the snow's surface during an avalanche. Steel tank features a pressure gauge, valve stem and trigger housing. After deployment, the Backcountry Float compressed air cylinder must be refilled by Backcountry Access or an authorized retail location. Cylinder comes empty; please visit the Backcountry Access website at www.backcountryaccess.com to find an authorized retail location to fill the cylinder.
short_description: This Backcountry Float compressed air cylinder works with Float Avalanche Airbag packs to rapidly inflate the airbag and help keep you at or near the snow's surface during an avalanche.
